++ Device Digital Audio Interface Presonus Firepod

+++ SUMMARY


+++ DETAILS
++++ ASSEMBLY/DISASSEMBLY
  * Disassembly:
    * 4 screws , 2 top, 2 bottom near where silver meets black
      * more fine thread.
    
    * Back side screws on MIDI (2) and SPDIF (1) 
      * coarser thread 

  * At this point the side panels will come off naturally.
    * the Black, larger covering will come off once you release a
      chord that joins the back power switch to a PCB board on the
      back right side (while facing front.)
